1085234285613928448.text:
Idea: harbeger tax scheme for open source licences.

You build a proprietary extension and you price it at X. 

You either pay tax on x to the creator of the software OR anyone can pay you X to release the source code

Maybe after some period you no longer have to pay tax.

998802381256183808.text: I'm worried that I'm misusing words or that this is not meditation or something. It was an experiment in a kind of experience I would never normally get. Super valuable just for that. More valuable in prompting more experiments.

998802380304117760.text: The structure was 9AM - 9PM, 30min - 2hr blocks of meditation observing breath, split up by breaks of 30min - 1hr, totalling ~7.5hr of meditating. A generous estimate would be I got proper focus/progress for about 30% of that time.

998802379301629954.text: Yesterday myself and a friend ran a first long form meditation experiment. Main thought afterwards is that while the actual act is incredibly difficult (as anticipated), the experimentation over large time scales (to me), is surprisingly achievable.
